Name: Identification number of the position
Description: All the different observational units (n = 115 + MEHR). Used as connection element.

Name: Identification numer of the site
Description: All the different sites (n = 15 + mehr). Each site contains several observational units (positions) along a snowmelt gradient.

Name: GPS coordinate (longitude)
Description: Longitudinal GPS coordinate (CH1903+ / LV95) of the position, measured with an iPhone 8 using (WRITE APP HERE).

Name: GPS coordinate (latitude)
Description: Latitudinal GPS coordinate (CH1903+ / LV95) of the position, measured with an iPhone 8 using (WRITE APP HERE).

Name: Elevation
Description: Elevation of the position, measured with an iPhone 8 using (WRITE APP).

Name: Macroexposure in degrees
Description: Exposure of the whole site (in degrees), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using (WRITE COMPASS APP).

Name: Macroexposure as geographic direction
Description: Exposure of the whole site (geographic direction), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using (WRITE COMPASS APP).

Name: Slope
Description: Slope of the position, measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using (WRITE APP).

Name: Exposure in degrees
Description: Exposure of the position (in degrees), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using (WRITE COMPASS APP).

Name: Exposure as geographic direction
Description: Exposure of the position (geographic direction), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using (WRITE COMPASS APP).

Name: Topography
Description: Micro-topography around the position (40x40cm): convex, concave or flat. Estimated by eye.

Name: Soil depth measurement 1
Description: Soil depth around the position (15x15cm), measured using a 60cm long metal bar (measurement 1).

Name: Soil depth measurement 2
Description: Soil depth around the position (15x15cm), measured using a 60cm long metal bar (measurement 2).

Name: Soil depth measurement 3
Description: Soil depth around the position (15x15cm), measured using a 60cm long metal bar (measurement 3).

Name: Identification numer of the species
Description: Identification numer of the plant species (tussock grass) of the position under which the temperature logger was burried. Used as connection element.

Name: Species
Description: Plant species (tussock grass) of the position under which the temperature logger was burried. *Carex curvula (Cc)* or *Nardus stricta (Ns)* or *Helictotrichon versicolor (Hv)* or *Elyna myosuroides (Em)* or *Control (Con)*.

Name: Description
Description: Description of the observational unit and additional notes.
